Contacts REST API Documentation¶

This API provides endpoints for managing contacts and user authentication.

Authentication¶

class src.auth.repo.UserRepository(session)[source]¶

Repository for managing User entities in the database.

Handles user creation, retrieval, and profile updates with proper security measures.

session¶

Database session for operations

Type:

AsyncSession

async activate_user(user: User)[source]¶

Activate user account after email verification.

Parameters:

user (User) – User object to activate

async create_user(user_create: UserCreate)[source]¶

Create new user with hashed password.

Parameters:

user_create (UserCreate) – User registration data

Returns:

Created user object with hashed password

Return type:

User

async get_user_by_email(email: str)[source]¶

Find user by email address.

Parameters:

email (str) – Email to search for

Returns:

Found user or None

Return type:

User

async get_user_by_username(username: str)[source]¶

Find user by username.

Parameters:

username (str) – Username to search for

Returns:

Found user or None

Return type:

User

async update_avatar(user_id: int, avatar_url: str)[source]¶

Update user’s avatar URL.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – ID of user to update

  • avatar_url (str) – New avatar image URL

Returns:

Updated user object or None

Return type:

User

async src.auth.router.login_for_access_token(from_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(NoneType), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Generate access and refresh tokens for valid credentials.

async src.auth.router.refresh_token(refresh_token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Generate new access token using refresh token.

async src.auth.router.register(user_create: UserCreate, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Register new user and send verification email.

Rate limited endpoint that creates new user account and triggers verification email.

async src.auth.router.update_avatar(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Upload user avatar to Cloudinary and update profile.

async src.auth.router.verify_email(token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Verify user’s email address using verification token.

Contacts Management¶

class src.contacts.repos.ContactRepository(session: AsyncSession)[source]¶

Repository for managing Contact entities in the database.

This class handles all database operations related to contacts including creating, reading, updating and deleting contact records.

session¶

The database session for performing operations.

Type:

AsyncSession

async contact_update(contact_id: int, contact_data: ContactCreate)[source]¶

Update an existing contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to update

  • contact (ContactUpdate) – The new contact data

Returns:

The updated contact object

Return type:

Contact

async create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, owner_id: int) → Contact[source]¶

Create a new contact in the database.

Parameters:

  • contact (ContactCreate) – The contact data to create.

  • owner_id (int) – The ID of the user who owns this contact.

Returns:

The newly created contact object.

Return type:

Contact

async delete_contact(contact_id: int)[source]¶

Delete a contact from the database.

Parameters:

contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to delete.

Returns:

True if contact was deleted, False if not found

Return type:

bool

async get_all_contacts(user_id: int, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100) → list[Contact][source]¶

Retrieve all contacts for a specific user with pagination.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user whose contacts to retrieve

  • skip (int, optional) – Number of records to skip. Defaults to 0.

  • limit (int, optional) – Maximum number of records to return. Defaults to 100.

Returns:

List of Contact objects belonging to the user

Return type:

list[Contact]

async get_contacts(contact_id: int) → Contact[source]¶

Retrieve a contact by its ID.

Parameters:

contact_id (int) – The unique identifier of the contact.

Returns:

The found contact object or None if not found.

Return type:

Contact

async get_upcoming_birthdays(user_id: int) → list[Contact][source]¶

Get contacts with birthdays in the next 7 days.

Returns:

List of contacts with upcoming birthdays

Return type:

List[Contact]

async search_contacts(search_text: str, user_id: int) → list[Contact][source]¶

Search contacts by name, email or phone.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – Search query string

  • owner_id (int) – ID of contacts owner

Returns:

List of matching contacts

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.contacts.router.create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Create a new contact for the authenticated user.

Parameters:

  • contact (ContactCreate) – Contact data to create

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user from token

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

Created contact data

Return type:

ContactResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If rate limit exceeded

async src.contacts.router.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]¶

Delete a specific contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of contact to delete

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact not found or doesn’t belong to user

async src.contacts.router.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]¶

Retrieve a specific contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of contact to retrieve

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Contact data if found

Return type:

ContactResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact not found or doesn’t belong to user

async src.contacts.router.get_contacts(skip: int = Query(0), limit: int = Query(10), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Get paginated list of all contacts for the authenticated user.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – Number of records to skip for pagination

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of records to return

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

List of contacts

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.contacts.router.search_contacts(query: str = Query(PydanticUndefined), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Search contacts by name, surname, or email.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – Search query string

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

List of matching contacts

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.contacts.router.upcoming_birthdays(user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Get contacts with birthdays in the next 7 days.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

List of contacts with upcoming birthdays

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.contacts.router.update_contact(contact_id: int, contact_data: ContactUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]¶

Update an existing contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of contact to update

  • contact (ContactUpdate) – New contact data

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

Updated contact data

Return type:

ContactResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact not found or doesn’t belong to user
